com.aston.group.stationdefender.actors

Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aston.group.stationdefender.actors.Unit
      • com.aston.group.stationdefender.actors.Weapon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CloseCombatWeapon, Mine, RapidFireWeapon

    public class Weapon
extends Unit
    Weapon is a class that represents a weapon object that Humans (Unit) can arm themselves with and use to destroy Aliens

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Weapon()
      Construct a new Weapon with default X and Y co-ordinates of '0'

              int x,

              int cost,
              int costToUpgrade)
        Construct a new Weapon with given name, speed, damage, rateOfFile, health, range, x co-ordinate, y co-ordinate, width, height, buildTime, cost and costToUpgrade parameters
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Weapon
        speed - The speed of the Weapon
        damage - The damage the Weapon inflicts
        rateOfFire - The rate of fire of the Weapon
        health - The health of the Weapon
        range - The range of the Weapon
        chanceToHit - The chance of the Weapon to score a hit
        x - The X co-ordinate of the Weapon
        y - The Y co-ordinate of the Weapon
        width - The width of the Weapon
        height - The height of the Weapon
        buildTime - The build time of the Weapon
        cost - The cost of the Weapon
        costToUpgrade - THe cost to upgrade to the Weapon

      • decrementBuildTimer

        public void decrementBuildTimer()
        Decrements the build timer by 0.5 if the time since the last call to the method is greater than or equal to 500 milliseconds. If afterwards the build timer is less than or equal to 0 then built is set to true.
